articles.description: On the occasion of World AIDS Vaccine Day, let us tell you why we don't have a safe, effective and affordable vaccine for the HIV virus, which is the cause of one of humanity's most persistent epidemics.
articles.content:
• WHO says as many as 75 million people have been infected with the HIV virus since the beginning of the epidemic
  • World AIDS Vaccine Day spreads awareness about the urgent need for a safe, effective and affordable HIV/AIDS vaccine

articles.title: Need Proof That Masks Protect Against Covid-19? Study Finds How Long Speech Droplets Can Stay Airborne - Forbes
articles.description: A new study shows how long speech-generated droplets can linger in the air: not cough- or sneeze-generated droplets, but plain old conversation level emissions.
